tutText01
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
Bienvenue dans la Hollywood Hills House, où vous pouvez vivre comme une star!
Willkommen im Hollywood Hills Haus, wo du leben kannst wie ein Promi.
Benvenuti nella Casa Hollywood Hills, dove puoi vivere come una celebrità!
¡Bienvenido a la casa de Hollywood Hills, donde vivirás como un famoso!
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
Welcome to the Hollywood Hills House, where you can live like a celebrity!
tutText02
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
Regardez une vidéo avec vos amis dans l'une des deux zones de projection.
Schau dir in einer der beiden Videoareas mit Freunden Filme an.
Guarda i video con i tuoi amici in una delle tue postazioni apposite.
Puedes ver vídeos con tus amigos en una de las dos salas de vídeo.
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
Watch videos with your friends in one of your two viewing areas.
tutText03
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
Pour accéder aux vidéos, veuillez utiliser la télécommande située sur le canapé du salon du haut...
Um die Videos zu sehen benutze bitte die Fernbedienung beim Sofa auf der im Wohnbereich im Obergeschoss...
Per guardare i video, usa il telecomando che trovi sul divano nel salone al piano di sopra...
Para acceder a los vídeos, utiliza el mando situado en el sofá de la salita del piso de arriba…
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
In order to access videos, please use the remote located on your upstairs living room couch...
tutText04
...or the remote in your downstairs private theater. Please note that only one screen can be used at a time.
…ou la télécommande de votre home cinéma du bas. Vous ne pouvez utiliser qu'un écran à la fois.
... oder die Fernbedienung in deinem privaten Heimkino im Untergeschoss. Bitte beachte, dass immer nur ein Bildschirm gleichzeitig aktiv sein kann.
...oppure il telecomando che trovi nel theater al piano di sotto. Nota: puoi usare solo uno schermo per volta.
…o el mando de tu teatro privado, en el piso de abajo. Recuerda que las pantallas no se pueden utilizar a la vez.
...or the remote in your downstairs private theater. Please note that only one screen can be used at a time.

tutText05
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
Après cela, passez des bons moments avec vos amis au bord de la piscine, relaxez-vous dans le Jacuzzi et profitez du beau panorama sur Los Angeles!
Danach kannst du mit deinen Freunden am Pool abhängen, im Jacuzzi entspannen du die Aussicht auf die Skyline von LA bewundern.
Poi potrai startene a bordo piscina con i tuoi amici, rilassarti nella Jacuzzi e ammirare la skyline di LA!
¡Después puedes pasar un rato agradable junto a la piscina con tus amigos, relajarte en el jacuzzi y disfrutar de unas alucinantes vistas de LA!
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
After that, hang out by the pool with your friends, relax in the Jacuzzi and enjoy your view of the LA skyline!
tutText06
Customize your home theater with your own furniture.
Personnalisez votre home cinéma avec vos propres meubles.
Statte dein Heimkino mit deinen eigenen Möbeln aus.
Personalizza il tuo home theater con il tuo arredamento.
Personaliza tu teatro privado con tus propios muebles.
